title: Deployer duty: use high-risk AI systems per instructions (technical and organisational measures)

article_refs.quote: Deployers of high-risk AI systems shall take appropriate technical and organisational measures to ensure they use such systems in accordance with the instructions for use ...

legal_consequence.verbatim: Deployers of high-risk AI systems shall take appropriate technical and organisational measures to ensure they use such systems in accordance with the instructions for use accompanying the systems, pursuant to paragraphs 3 and 6.

items.label: Penalty (Art. 99)
items.text: Obligation/requirement; administrative fines up to EUR 15,000,000 or 3% of worldwide turnover (whichever is higher) may apply, subject to SME caps and due process.

question.prompt: Does Article 2 scope apply (and no exclusion)?
Is the actor a deployer per Art. 3(4)?
Is the AI system high-risk under Art. 6?
Is the system high-risk solely via Art. 6(1) and covered by Annex I Section B legislation?
